.git/hooks/update.sample

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/bin/sh
00002 #
00003 # An example hook script to blocks unannotated tags from entering.
00004 # Called by "git receive-pack" with arguments: refname sha1-old sha1-new
00005 #
00006 # To enable this hook, rename this file to "update".
00007 #
00008 # Config
00009 # ------
00010 # hooks.allowunannotated
00011 #   This boolean sets whether unannotated tags will be allowed into the
00012 #   repository.  By default they won't be.
00013 # hooks.allowdeletetag
00014 #   This boolean sets whether deleting tags will be allowed in the
00015 #   repository.  By default they won't be.
00016 # hooks.allowmodifytag
00017 #   This boolean sets whether a tag may be modified after creation. By default
00018 #   it won't be.
00019 # hooks.allowdeletebranch
00020 #   This boolean sets whether deleting branches will be allowed in the
00021 #   repository.  By default they won't be.
00022 # hooks.denycreatebranch
00023 #   This boolean sets whether remotely creating branches will be denied
00024 #   in the repository.  By default this is allowed.
00025 #
00026 
00027 # --- Command line
00028 refname="$1"
00029 oldrev="$2"
00030 newrev="$3"
00031 
00032 # --- Safety check
00033 if [ -z "$GIT_DIR" ]; then
00034     echo "Don't run this script from the command line." >&2
00035     echo " (if you want, you could supply GIT_DIR then run" >&2
00036     echo "  $0 <ref> <oldrev> <newrev>)" >&2
00037     exit 1
00038 fi
00039 
00040 if [ -z "$refname" -o -z "$oldrev" -o -z "$newrev" ]; then
00041     echo "Usage: $0 <ref> <oldrev> <newrev>" >&2
00042     exit 1
00043 fi
00044 
00045 # --- Config
00046 allowunannotated=$(git config --bool hooks.allowunannotated)
00047 allowdeletebranch=$(git config --bool hooks.allowdeletebranch)
00048 denycreatebranch=$(git config --bool hooks.denycreatebranch)
00049 allowdeletetag=$(git config --bool hooks.allowdeletetag)
00050 allowmodifytag=$(git config --bool hooks.allowmodifytag)
00051 
00052 # check for no description
00053 projectdesc=$(sed -e '1q' "$GIT_DIR/description")
00054 case "$projectdesc" in
00055 "Unnamed repository"* | "")
00056     echo "*** Project description file hasn't been set" >&2
00057     exit 1
00058     ;;
00059 esac
00060 
00061 # --- Check types
00062 # if $newrev is 0000...0000, it's a commit to delete a ref.
00063 zero="0000000000000000000000000000000000000000"
00064 if [ "$newrev" = "$zero" ]; then
00065     newrev_type=delete
00066 else
00067     newrev_type=$(git cat-file -t $newrev)
00068 fi
00069 
00070 case "$refname","$newrev_type" in
00071     refs/tags/*,commit)
00072         # un-annotated tag
00073         short_refname=${refname##refs/tags/}
00074         if [ "$allowunannotated" != "true" ]; then
00075             echo "*** The un-annotated tag, $short_refname, is not allowed in this repository" >&2
00076             echo "*** Use 'git tag [ -a | -s ]' for tags you want to propagate." >&2
00077             exit 1
00078         fi
00079         ;;
00080     refs/tags/*,delete)
00081         # delete tag
00082         if [ "$allowdeletetag" != "true" ]; then
00083             echo "*** Deleting a tag is not allowed in this repository" >&2
00084             exit 1
00085         fi
00086         ;;
00087     refs/tags/*,tag)
00088         # annotated tag
00089         if [ "$allowmodifytag" != "true" ] && git rev-parse $refname > /dev/null 2>&1
00090         then
00091             echo "*** Tag '$refname' already exists." >&2
00092             echo "*** Modifying a tag is not allowed in this repository." >&2
00093             exit 1
00094         fi
00095         ;;
00096     refs/heads/*,commit)
00097         # branch
00098         if [ "$oldrev" = "$zero" -a "$denycreatebranch" = "true" ]; then
00099             echo "*** Creating a branch is not allowed in this repository" >&2
00100             exit 1
00101         fi
00102         ;;
00103     refs/heads/*,delete)
00104         # delete branch
00105         if [ "$allowdeletebranch" != "true" ]; then
00106             echo "*** Deleting a branch is not allowed in this repository" >&2
00107             exit 1
00108         fi
00109         ;;
00110     refs/remotes/*,commit)
00111         # tracking branch
00112         ;;
00113     refs/remotes/*,delete)
00114         # delete tracking branch
00115         if [ "$allowdeletebranch" != "true" ]; then
00116             echo "*** Deleting a tracking branch is not allowed in this repository" >&2
00117             exit 1
00118         fi
00119         ;;
00120     *)
00121         # Anything else (is there anything else?)
00122         echo "*** Update hook: unknown type of update to ref $refname of type $newrev_type" >&2
00123         exit 1
00124         ;;
00125 esac
00126 
00127 # --- Finished
00128 exit 0
Generated on 21 Nov 2016 for A_(W)Hole_Map by  1.6.1
